titles.en: Chapter 133 – The one who performs Tawaaf and cuts it short at the (Black) Stone

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ طَافَ عَلَى غَيْرِ وُضُوءٍ
titles.en: Chapter 134 – The one who performs Tawaaf without being in ablution
Chapter 132 – The pairing between the two seven (circuits)

titles.ar: بَابُ مَنْ طَافَ وَ اخْتَصَرَ فِي الْحِجْرِ
titles.en: Chapter 133 – The one who performs Tawaaf and cuts it short at the (Black) Stone

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (8/43)

parts.text: أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الرَّجُلِ يَطُوفُ بِالْبَيْتِ فَاخْتَصَرَ

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ حَفْصِ بْنِ الْبَخْتَرِيِّ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) فِي الرَّجُلِ يَطُوفُ بِالْبَيْتِ فَاخْتَصَرَ قَالَ

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hafs Bin Al Bakhtary,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws regarding the man who performs Tawaaf by the House, but cuts it short. Heasws said: ‘He should fulfil what he shortens from his Tawaaf’.
en.sarwar: 1. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Hafs ibn al-Bakhtariy who has said the following: “About a man who performs Tawaf around the House [but cuts it short], abu ‘ Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al- Salam, has said, ’He must do Qada’ (compensatory fast) of what he has cut short of his Tawaf.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: حسن - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (18/43)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ مُعَاوِيَةَ بْنِ عَمَّارٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: مَنِ اخْتَصَرَ فِي الْحِجْرِ فِي الطَّوَافِ فَلْيُعِدْ طَوَافَهُ مِنَ الْحَجَرِ الْأَسْوَدِ إِلَى الْحَجَرِ الْأَسْوَدِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Muawiya Bin Ammar,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullahasws having said: ‘The one who cuts short at the (Black) Stone during the Tawaaf, so let him repeat his Tawaaf from the Black Stone to the Black Stone’.
en.sarwar: 2. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Mu‘awiyah ibn ‘Ammar who has said the following: “Abu ’Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Whoever keeps his Tawaf short before the Black Stone, he must repeat his Tawaf commencing from the Black Stone and end at the front of the Black Stone.’”
